musicRepresentation

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • musicRepresentation.Note

  • public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
    The Note class is composed of a Pitch object and a durationMultiplier (defaults to 1). Note is mutable. The information stored in Note will be used to later generate PreMidiNotes.
    Author:
    Eric

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Note(Pitch pitch)
      The first constructor method of Note, used when no durationMultiplier is given for the Note.
      Note(Pitch pitch, double durationMultiplier)
      The second constructor method of Note, used when a durationMultiplier is given for the Note.

      • Note

        public Note(Pitch pitch)
        The first constructor method of Note, used when no durationMultiplier is given for the Note.
        Parameters:

      • Note

        public Note(Pitch pitch,
    double durationMultiplier)
        The second constructor method of Note, used when a durationMultiplier is given for the Note.
        Parameters:
        pitch - the pitch of the Note
        durationMultiplier - the length the Note should be played for in comparison to the default length of the piece. Must be > 0.

    • Method Detail

      • getDurationMultiplier

        public double getDurationMultiplier()
        Returns:
        the durationMultiplier of the Note.

      • multiplyDurationMultiplier

        public void multiplyDurationMultiplier(double factor)
        Mutator Method. This method is used to correctly set the durationMultiplier of a tuplet. The only different thing about a tuplet is thats its constituent notes have different lengths.
        Parameters:
        factor - the factor to multiply durationMultiplier by. Must be > 0.

      • setDurationMultiplier

        public void setDurationMultiplier(double newDurationMultiplier)
        Mutator Method. This method is used to set the durationMultiplier on a Note in the case when the Note is part of a multi-note chord. As per the new specifications, the length of all notes in a Chord is determined by the duration of its first note. This method is used to correct the durationMultiplier of the other Notes. Pre-condition: newDurationMultiplier > 0
        Parameters:
        newDurationMultiplier - the number durationMultiplier should be set to. Must be > 0.

      • setPitch

        public void setPitch(Pitch newPitch)
        Sets the value of pitch to newPitch. Used in the constructor method of the Measure class.
        Parameters:
        newPitch - the new pitch of the Note
